description: Innominata Light ML Crew Neck Men, the versatile fleece sweater for all-year-round wear. This mid-layer stands out through its environmentally conscious production with the use of 100% recycled polyester. The double-weave contrast material on the chest pocket and shoulder reinforcement serves as a design element but also makes the sweater robust in those areas where backpack straps cause abrasion. Innominata Light ML Crew Neck Men: lightweight and comfortable to wear.
name: Mammut Innominata Light ML Crew Neck - Mens
